# Dependent Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Problem 1

The penguins data from the package `palmerpenguins` is loaded and described via

```{r Problem_1}
data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")

skimr::skim(penguins)
```

The penguins dataset contains `r ncol(penguins)` columns and `r nrow(penguins)` rows. The mean flipper length is `r penguins %>% pull(flipper_length_mm) %>% mean(na.rm=TRUE)`.
